    • Method Detail

      • canAcceptRequest

        public boolean canAcceptRequest(Request request,
                                UserMode userMode)
        Determines whether a request can be accepted by the user. Requests can be accepted by a driver when the request state is pending.
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        userMode - The user mode of the current user
        Returns:
        True when the request can be accepted, false otherwise.

      • acceptRequest

        public void acceptRequest(Request request,
                          android.content.Context context)
        Accept a request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to accept.

      • canCancelRequest

        public boolean canCancelRequest(Request request,
                                UserMode userMode)
        Determines whether a request can be cancelled by the user. Requests can be cancelled by a rider when the request state is pending.
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        userMode - The user mode of the current user
        Returns:
        True when the request can be cancelled, false otherwise.

      • cancelRequest

        public void cancelRequest(Request request)
        Cancel a request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to cancel.

      • canCompleteRequest

        public boolean canCompleteRequest(Request request,
                                  UserMode userMode)
        Determines whether a request can be completed by the user. Requests can be completed by a rider when the request state is confirmed.
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        userMode - The user mode of the current user
        Returns:
        True when the request can be confirmed, false otherwise.

      • canConfirmRequest

        public boolean canConfirmRequest(Request request,
                                 UserMode userMode)
        Determines whether a request can be confirmed by the user. Requests can be confirmed by a rider when the request state is accepted by a driver.
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        userMode - The user mode of the current user
        Returns:
        True when the request can be confirmed, false otherwise.

      • canDeclineRequest

        public boolean canDeclineRequest(Request request,
                                 UserMode userMode)
        Determines whether a request can be declined by the user. Requests can be declined by a rider when the request state is accepted by a driver.
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        userMode - The user mode of the current user
        Returns:
        True when the request can be declined, false otherwise.

      • declineRequest

        public void declineRequest(Request request)
        Decline a request.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to decline.

      • canDeleteRequest

        public boolean canDeleteRequest(Request request,
                                UserMode userMode)
        Determines whether a request can be deleted by the user. Requests can be deleted by a rider when the request is pending, cancelled, declined, or completed. A request can be deleted by a driver when the request is cancelled, declined, or completed.
        Parameters:
        request - The request
        userMode - The user mode of the current user
        Returns:
        True when the request can be declined, false otherwise.

      • deleteRequest

        public void deleteRequest(Request request)
        Delete a request from from the manager.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to delete.
